solution_line_template: First find the total cost of the tires: ${tire_cost_per_tire}/tire * {num_tires_slashed} tires = $<<{tire_cost_per_tire}*{num_tires_slashed}={total_tire_cost}>>{total_tire_cost}
Then add that amount to the cost of the window to find the total cost: ${window_cost} + ${total_tire_cost} = $<<{window_cost}+{total_tire_cost}={total_damages}>>{total_damages}
